h2_title: Green-Capped Martialist Boss Fight and Guide
content: He can also send his chakram spinning along the ground to slice past you. Sometimes he'll just use it to "walk the dog" as it slides at you and then back to him, but that's not all. While you're distracted, he can also follow up with a spinning kick before getting his weapon back.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Green-Capped_Martialist.md', within the main section titled 'Green-Capped Martialist', specifically from the subsection 'Green-Capped Martialist Boss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
He can also send his chakram spinning along the ground to slice past you. Sometimes he'll just use it to "walk the dog" as it slides at you and then back to him, but that's not all. While you're distracted, he can also follow up with a spinning kick before getting his weapon back.
